title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Finance) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister finance) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Kevin Barrett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Kevin Barrett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Finance with effect from 09 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 kevin barrett particular whose address deposited office department finance appointed special adviser minister finance effect 09 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Grant Sweetnam, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Grant Sweetnam, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Minister for Finance with effect from 09 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
11 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [291] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
